line_1: Tokay and Coffee cause this Work,
line_2: Between the German and the Turk:

line_1: The carlin left her housewife's wark,
line_2: The colley too would fidge and bark

line_1: On the Foundation has been long at work,
line_2: A Pestilential Sow, a meazel'd Pork

line_1: For once I'll set your lazy bones to work.
line_2: Fly, fly, you rascal, for your spade and fork;
He stop'd, and leaning on his fork

line_1: With double toil, and shiver at their work,
line_2: The peasants urge their harvest, plie the fork

line_1: Too sure at last, to do its destin'd work;
line_2: Which in its very Constitution lurk,

line_1: In the deep bosom of that weighty work;
line_2: No idle wit, no trifling verse can lurk

line_1: 'Twill soon be complete, and they say all their Work
line_2: Is as strong as St. Paul's, or the Minster at York.
Like Bow-string sent from the Grand Turk.

line_1: Than Sappho felt when Drury damn'd her work,
line_2: Or Gallia's struggles rais'd in zealous Burke!

line_1: Where balls for advocates prepare their work,
line_2: And embryo law-suits in a whisper lurk;

line_1: Now Baucis, who came hot from work,
line_2: Was very dry, her dinner pork;
